section.section:
The owner of a fleet of trailers or semitrailers may apply to the Administration for registration under this section of the Class G (trailer) vehicles in the fleet, if:
The fleet consists of at least 25 Class G (trailer) vehicles that are rented or offered for rent for periods of 364 days or less; or
The fleet consists of at least five Class G (trailer) vehicles with a permitted gross weight of over 10,000 pounds.
Each application made under this section shall contain the information that the Administration requires.

text.section: If the applicant pays the fees required by this section and meets the other conditions required by the Administration, the Administration shall issue a special registration plate and registration card for each vehicle for which application is made.

A special registration plate and registration card issued under this section:
May be issued for any period of up to 8 years as the Administration determines;
Shall expire on the date that the Administration determines; and
Until they expire, are valid only:
As long as the applicant retains ownership of the vehicle for which they are issued; and
If the registration is made on a prorated annual fee basis, as long as the owner pays the required annual fees before the date on which regular Class G registration plates expire.

section.section:
The fee for registration under this section shall be paid to the Administration, at the election of the applicant, either:
At the time of registration, for the full registration period; or
Annually, on a prorated fee basis.

The fee for the full registration period for each vehicle is the regular annual fee required for the vehicle under § 13-927 of this subtitle, multiplied by the number of years in the registration period.

text.section:
If the application is made on a prorated annual fee basis, the applicant shall submit with the application acceptable evidence of a surety bond or irrevocable letter of credit that is:
In a form and with a surety or insured Maryland financial institution approved by the Administration; and
In an amount equal to the total annual fees required for all vehicles registered to the applicant under this section.
